FuncDef:
The intelligent-flow enable slot command enables IFC on a board in a slot.
The undo intelligent-flow enable slot command disables IFC on a board in a slot.
The intelligent-flow packet min-length command sets a packet length.
The undo intelligent-flow packet min-length command restores the default packet length.
By default, IFC is not enabled.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a packet length.
The value is an integer that ranges from 64 to 2047 and the default is 1024.

ExtraInfo: The packet length can be configured only after IFC is enabled. Otherwise, an error message is displayed.
